Lux & lex, or The light and the lavv of Jacobs house: held forth in a sermon before the Honourable House of Commons at St Margarets Westminster March 31. 1647. being the day of publike humiliation. / By Robert Johnson, Eboraicus, one of the Assembly of Divines. Johnson, Robert, d. 1670.
[8], 38, [2] p.
Printed by A. Miller, for Philemon Stephens, at the signe of the Gilded Lion in Pauls Church-yard., London, : 1647.
Order to print on verso of first leaf. The last leaf is blank. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
